contents: Article 13-2 (Obligations) A committee member, secretary, or person who held that position must comply with the following obligations. Revised 2020. 11. 5. 1. Information or documents acquired in the course of committee activities cannot be arbitrarily published or distributed to others. 2. Confidential information learned while performing committee duties must not be disclosed or used for personal purposes. [This article was newly established on January 31, 2019]
